definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Once you open a page, it has formatting functions just as in word processor.
sentences.chinese: 每一个新页面都有与文书处理机相同的格式化功能。

sentences.english: A file system must be unmounted to be reformatted.
sentences.chinese: 一个文件系统必须在被缷载后才可以重新格式化。

sentences.english: There should definitely be no data formatting or parsing of non-standard formats.
sentences.chinese: 绝对不应对非标准格式进行数据格式化或解析。

sentences.english: The other major innovation in this example is the use of formatted printing.
sentences.chinese: 本例中的另一项主要创新是使用了格式化打印。

sentences.english: Word-processor like formatting commands that apply to text and equations.
sentences.chinese: 类似字处理器的格式化命令适用于文本和方程。

sentences.english: So these format strings we saw earlier.
sentences.chinese: 比如之前看到的格式化字符串。

sentences.english: Could not display help for the floppy formatter.
sentences.chinese: 无法显示软碟格式化程式的说明文件。

sentences.english: This class is an abstract base class for implementations which provide retrieval of unformatted data objects.
sentences.chinese: 一个抽象的基类，只提供获取未格式化的原始数据。

sentences.english: Partitions are divisions in the formatting of the hard disk.
sentences.chinese: 分区就是硬盘格式化过程中的空间划分。

sentences.english: Displays a message box with an unformatted string and an OK button.
sentences.chinese: 用未格式化的串和OK按钮显示消息。

sentences.english: Data files can be formatted in a variety of ways. The HPL supports data file records of the following formats
sentences.chinese: 数据文件可以用各种方式格式化。

sentences.english: Low-level input and output calls do directli function stream not buffer or format data.
sentences.chinese: 低级输入输出对数据不进行缓冲或格式化。

sentences.english: The resource is formatted and highlighted, and arrays and objects can be collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 资源已经格式化并突出显示，可以把数组和对象收拢。

sentences.english: String contains non-numeric character(s). Please enter a valid number.
sentences.chinese: 输入格式化源字符串数据所需的参数。

sentences.english: The controller requests data from the model and sends it to the view for formatting.
sentences.chinese: 控制器从模型请求数据并发送给视图完成格式化。

sentences.english: Audiovisual and computer formatted philatelic programs, Web pages included.
sentences.chinese: 音像和计算机程序格式化集邮，网页中。

definition: drive letter (letter assigned to a disk drive or partition) (computing)
USB flash drive/see also 閃存盤|闪存盘[shan3 cun2 pan2]
